/*
    This code orders 6 feet robot move to -y direction
    author: LiaoJingyi
*/
    int dtime=500;
    Com.printf("%s","#1P1300T500#2P2000T500#3P1800T500#4P1300T500#5P2000T500#6P1200T500#7P1300T500#8P2000T500#9P1500T500#10P1300T500#11P2000T500#12P1500T500#13P1300T500#14P2000T500#15P1200T500#16P1300T500#17P2000T500#18P1800T500\r\n");
    wait_ms(dtime);
    while(1)
    {
    Com.printf("%s","#1P1300T100#2P2000T100#3P1900T100#4P1300T100#5P1900T100#6P1500T100#7P1300T100#8P1900T100#9P1400T100#10P1300T100#11P2000T100#12P1400T100#13P1300T100#14P2000T100#15P1500T100#16P1300T100#17P1900T100#18P1900T100\r\n");
    wait_ms(dtime);
    Com.printf("%s","#1P1300T20#2P2000T20#3P1900T20#4P1300T20#5P2000T20#6P1500T20#7P1300T20#8P2000T20#9P1400T20#10P1300T20#11P2000T20#12P1400T20#13P1300T20#14P2000T20#15P1500T20#16P1300T20#17P2000T20#18P1900T20\r\n");
    wait_ms(dtime);
    Com.printf("%s","#1P1300T100#2P1900T100#3P1500T100#4P1300T100#5P2000T100#6P1100T100#7P1300T100#8P2000T100#9P1600T100#10P1300T100#11P1900T100#12P1600T100#13P1300T100#14P1900T100#15P1100T100#16P1300T100#17P2000T100#18P1500T100\r\n");
    wait_ms(dtime);
    Com.printf("%s","#1P1300T20#2P2000T20#3P1500T20#4P1300T20#5P2000T20#6P1100T20#7P1300T20#8P2000T20#9P1600T20#10P1300T20#11P2000T20#12P1600T20#13P1300T20#14P2000T20#15P1100T20#16P1300T20#17P2000T20#18P1500T20\r\n");
    wait_ms(dtime);
    }
